Text: Revision to FritoLay RFPTargeted Suppliers Please make the following revision to the RFP received Friday from FritoLay Inc On Page Two of the RFP under the heading of PRICING BID COMPONENTS in the paragraph addressing INTERSTATE TRANSPORTATION MANAGEMENT for parts a and b please delete the phrase MINUS FUEL CHARGES in both instances Please accept our apology for any confusion the original language may have caused Any questions or comments may be addressed to Frances Schwartz
